title: Weird Lag in game
body: So when i play at night, i get this weird lag where my champ just stops in place and i cant move. I can click everything and when i look at my ping and fps its normal there isnt a spike. im sooo confused its been happening for the last couple nights. Ive played other games and no lag. I even restart my router every night before i play and it still happens. anyone else experiencing this?

replies.body: This kind of input delay is usually due to a network issue, and it's strange that it's happening at a specific time every night.  This could either be some kind of background processes your PC is working on at that time, or possibly a change in your ISP's routing during that period.  Do you have any antivirus downloads or maintenance happening during this time that could be taking bandwidth?  I suggest going over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help tune up your connection and make sure your settings are ok!  Let me know if these steps help!

Also it happens to my husband too, when we are in the same game we both stop at the same time.
well, I haven't tried playing in the day. Ill put it to the test. I do not have any maintenance going on; I normally do all my maintenance checks in the mornings before I even start to play anything. Alrighty i'll see to that connection issues page. Thanks i'll let you know!
